title: Horror Music pack - Decay
description: Crafted for darkness, perfect for horror
longDescription:
Preview


Decay is a collection of 30 original tracks—14 dark ambiences and 16 trip-hop beats—designed for horror game developers. 

Each track has been composed to evoke feelings of sorrow, isolation, and fear, ensuring that players remain on edge throughout their journey. With a blend of industrial soundscapes, haunting melodies, and unsettling rhythms, Decay is your go-to resource for creating unforgettable horror game experiences



Why Choose Decay?

  • Atmosphere: 30 original tracks that weave eerie ambiences with haunting beats, perfect for building tension and fear.
  • Professional Quality: Available in high-quality WAV, ensuring your game sounds as terrifying as it looks.
  • Seamless Integration: Loopable tracks mean your players stay immersed in the horror without a break.
  • Royalty-Free: One purchase unlocks unlimited use in your commercial projects—no strings attached.
  • Inspired by the Best: Crafted with the same eerie essence that made Silent Hill an icon.




Potential Uses:

  • Survival horror games
  • Psychological thrillers
  • Dark adventure games
  • Suspenseful visual novels
  • Any project needing an eerie, unsettling atmosphere
technicalDetails:
Total Lenght:: 1:19:49

Number of Audio Wavs: 30

Number of Audio Cues: 30

Sample rate: 48000 Hz

Bit Depth: 24 Bit PCM

Does music loop: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: Windows and Mac
